SELECT id,sku_id skuId,sku_name skuName,sku_jd_price skuJdPrice,sku_count skuCount, sku_store_price skuStorePrice,sku_cost_price skuCostPrice,sku_weight skuWeight, sku_status skuStatus,order_id orderId FROM product_order_jd
AND order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT a.order_id orderId,a.order_num orderNum,b.sku_id skuId,b.sku_name skuName, b.sku_count skuCount,b.sku_store_price skuStorePrice,b.sku_status skuStatus,a.update_time updateTime, a.order_buyer_remark orderBuyerRemark,a.create_time createTime,c.img_url imgUrl FROM order_jd a JOIN product_order_jd b ON b.order_id=a.order_id JOIN product_jd c ON c.sku_id=b.sku_id WHERE a.produce_station_no = #{belongStationNo} AND a.`status` = #{orderStatus}
AND a.update_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
